attributes.action: Introduce a zero tolerance approach to tackling anti-social behaviour supported by increased powers for the police and authorities to stop behaviour immediately before residents and law abiding people suffer long-term harassment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current enforcement methods used to tackle antisocial behaviour are not dealing with the problem. ASBOs are not acting as a deterrent and it can take months of complaining to authorities  to get anything done. 

As has been noted by many commentators we are losing control of our streets

This petition calls for a zero tolerance approach to dealing with antisocial behaviour with much stronger powers, such as a greater use of on the spot fines, community service orders and custodial sentences used at a very early stage to stop this behaviour.

Neighbours from hell and antisocial youths should know that their actions face immediate punishment.
